security: This document contains personal information, specifically social security numbers and salary details, of individuals employed by the Select Committee on Assassinations. Sharing this information could violate privacy and potentially expose individuals to identity theft or other harms.
summary: This is a U.S. House of Representatives certification report for the Select Committee on Assassinations, detailing the annual gross pay and period salary earned by committee staff for the accounting period of September 1-30, 1978.
summary_one_paragraph: The U.S. House of Representatives report D01.00.00 is a certification report for the Select Committee on Assassinations, covering the accounting period from September 1 to September 30, 1978. It lists employees of the committee, their social security numbers, positions, annual gross pay, and the salary earned during the specified period, along with any relevant remarks such as terminations or pay rate changes. The report includes names such as G. Robert Blakey (Chief Counsel and Director) and details salary limits for the committee.
title: Certification Report
